community_hub.title: Community Hub
community_hub.description: Share your wellness journey, celebrate wins, ask questions, and connect with others on similar paths. Whether you're focusing on your holistic lifestyle or navigating your diabetes journey â€” we've got you covered.

weekly_themes.name: New Intentions
prompts: What intention are you setting this year?
What fresh habit do you want to try?

weekly_themes.name: Building Momentum
prompts: What small step moved you forward this week?
What routine supports your energy?

weekly_themes.name: Letting Go
prompts: What habit or worry are you ready to release?
How does letting go open space for healing?

weekly_themes.name: Celebrating Progress
prompts: What small win are you proud of?
How are you stronger than last month?

weekly_themes.name: Self-Love
prompts: What's one kind thing you told yourself today?
How did you honor your needs?

weekly_themes.name: Connection
prompts: Who brought warmth to your life this week?

weekly_themes.name: Compassion

feed.text: What's one nourishing choice you made today?
Grateful for my evening walk â€” it helped me reset my energy.
I am more than my numbers. Every small step supports my healing.

feed.title: Streak Star!
feed.text: You've logged 7 gratitude reflections in a row â€” amazing consistency!
